name: Ironclad/Never Again Split 7"
description:
This is our split 7" with Never Again, released on the UK's finest, Carry the Weight records. It was meant to contain four of our songs and two of theirs, but ours were too long and theirs were too short, so you end up with three of ours and four of theirs as well as artwork by Justice alumni Spoiler. 

This record comes on black vinyl, limited to 100 copies, the yellow and green vinyl sold out.

name: Death Row Green/Black Shirt
description:
We originially printed this design up for the final D&G/Dirty Money alldayer, but our man Brad T did such a good job on the design front we couldn't resist doing a second and final press for our Euro tour, this time though they come with toxic green instead of blue ink. 

Two Youth Large left only.

name: Ark of the Covenant 7"
description:
Featuring members of Ironclad, Wiretap, Wraith and Carrion of Vigrid, CCHC's Ark of the Covenant play metallic hardcore in a way that would have really bummed out UKHC a few years ago. Born too late. Still, if you dig Arkangel, Slayer, At the Gates and/or Morning Again, this might well be your jam.

Record available on Blue/Green or White/Blue/Green splatter, both limited to 200 copies.
